body_html: @max1000000 Sure, it's possible. You'll just have to install Numpy and MKL from here. And then you should install PyYAML using pip. After that, you can install the whl package from CI. You can get more info from my repo here.
body_text: @max1000000 Sure, it's possible. You'll just have to install Numpy and MKL from here. And then you should install PyYAML using pip. After that, you can install the whl package from CI. You can get more info from my repo here.
body: @max1000000 Sure, it's possible. You'll just have to install Numpy and MKL from [here](https://www.lfd.uci.edu/~gohlke/pythonlibs/). And then you should install PyYAML using pip. After that, you can install the whl package from CI. You can get more info from my repo [here](https://github.com/peterjc123/pytorch-scripts).
